summary:
A new mod for those of us who have played through the game and want a quick way to get a character up and going for whatever reason.

I have started adding versions specific to classes with much milder skill and inventory updates for those seeking more of a challenge. Currently Lite and Ranger/Thief are available.
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE IF THIS HELPS YOU GET WHAT YOU WANT FROM THE GAME TAKE A SECOND TO ENDORSE. 

This mod will give you most of the necessary starting items for the Rogue, Hunter , Thief, Warrior type of character. 

Starting health, magic and stamina are increased to 300,200,200 respectively.  

Minor enhancement to most starting skills bumps them to 30.  

I have added the perks that make the most sense for characters of this type.

All Alchemy perks
All Archery perks
All Blacksmith perks
Almost all Enchanting perks

Various other perks in Sneak, Pickpocket and Speechcraft lines.

Please note this will set your level to (1) 

This will provide a full suit of Daedric Armor and the suite of weapons.  I have included Ebony as well.

I have bumped Enchanting and Alchemy to 100 so that if you choose to make an OP character your well on your way.  I have included all items and weapons that have what I consider the better enchants, I have included ingredients for making Fort Resto , Fort Enchanting and set your starting carry weight to 1000 this will change when you log off of the game so get the items disenchanted quickly or get to where you can store them.  

I have also added 40k gold a pick axe and a lock-pick.

I have added some basic potions as well.  Heal , Enchant, and Blacksmith elixirs. 

To run:

Extract or Copy this file \"Ultimate\" to your skyrim directory.
Launch Game
Open console by pressing \"~\" on your keyboard
Type \"bat Ultimate\"
or for the light version type \"bat UltimateLite\"
Press \"~\" again and enjoy.


Ultimate Lite 

Player will be set to level 5

Player gold set to 4000
Pickaxe and Lockpick
Health 150
Stamina and Magika 120
All magic and weapon skills set to 25
Enchanting, Alchemy and Smithing set to 50 

Alchemist Rank 5
Marksman Overdraw Rank 5
Pickpocket Light Fingers Rank 5
Stealth Rank 5 plus Muffle
Speechcraft Haggling Rank 5

Removed all armor and Uber items for disenchant.

Unless noted all other items are the same or similar to the full version.

****************************
New Ranger Thief version

Player starts as a level 1 thief 
health/stamina/magic 150/120/120
Full glass armor to start
Daedric bow, 1handed sword and dagger

Included Perks that make sense for the class. 
Among areas that are enhanced are :
Archery
Alchemy
Speechcraft
Sneak
Pickpocket
Enchanting
Armorsmithing

I have included items for disenchanting and some potions to support you should you choose to make this character super powerful out of the gate however this is much milder then the full version and will allow the player to be challenged a bit more and more immersed in the game.


****************************
New Mage Version 
(minor correction today 10/11/2012 I had inadvertently left off the basic perks for each line , added novice and intermediate caster perk to each skill line ).

health/stamina/magic 150/120/150
All Magicka lines boosted to 35 to start
Boost to Speech craft as this makes a lot of sense ( casters being knowledgeable ) +5 to haggling

Full Enchanting and alchemy lines / skills at 100

included most of the spell books from Novice to Adept in each Spell Family.  This grants the Ultimate mage to pick and choose what paths and lines they wish to follow.

To install this script from console type 
\"bat magicka\"

**************************************
New Ultimate Warrior 

health/stamina/magic 170/150/120
starting gold 1k
pickaxe and lockpick

Player Armor and Weapons 
Ancient Nord Set with Nord Hero Weapons

Warrior starting skills bumped to 35
Marksman, Block, Onehanded, 2Handed, Heavy Armor - Added 1st tier perk to each of these skill sets 

Big Bonuses to Perks (Enchant,Smithing,Alchemy) included potions to get you well on your way in enchanting, blacksmithing and alchemy
***************************

In all specialized lines I have included items for disenchanting and some potions to support you should you choose to make this character super powerful out of the gate however this is much milder then the full version and will allow the player to be challenged a bit more and more immersed in the game.

PLEASE NOTE I ADMIT THIS MOD ISN\'T FOR EVERYONE.  I WOULD STRONGLY SUGGEST IF YOU HAVEN\'T EXPERIENCED THE GAME WITHOUT THIS TYPE OF MODDING COMPLETE THE GAME FIRST AND COME BACK TO THIS. 

Please feel free to post pictures of your new ULTIMATE Character!! 

IF YOU LIKE THIS PLEASE ENDORSE ME.  ALSO I WILL KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR COMMENTS AND SUGGESTIONS.
author: TheTimberwolf
